QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_fieldmappings.id odf_pk, int_fieldmappings.code as code, int_fieldmappings.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, om_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, om_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, int_fieldmappings.clarity_data_type as clarity_data_type, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, int_fieldmappings.external_data_type as external_data_type, int_fieldmappings.sync_option as sync_option, om_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, int_fieldmappings.om_id as om_id, int_fieldmappings.name as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_fieldmappings.external_field as external_field, INT_FIELDMAPPINGS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_field_mappings.partition_code as partition_code, INT_FIELDMAPPINGS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_fieldmappings.direction as direction, int_fieldmappings.clarity_field as clarity_field, om_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code, om_id.im_id as odf_grand_parent_id from int_fieldmappings int_fieldmappings, int_objectmappings int_objectmappings, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_field_mappings odf_ca_int_field_mappings, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_objectmappings.id odf_pk, im_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, im_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, int_objectmappings.im_id as im_id, im_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, im_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_objectmappings int_objectmappings, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_integrationmappings.id odf_pk, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, odf_ca_integration_mappings odf_ca_integration_mappings where 1 = 1 and int_integrationmappings.id = odf_ca_integration_mappings.id) im_id where 1 = 1 and int_objectmappings.im_id = im_id.odf_pk) om_id where 1 = 1 and int_fieldmappings.om_id = int_objectmappings.id and int_fieldmappings.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_fieldmappings.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_fieldmappings.id = odf_ca_int_field_mappings.id and int_fieldmappings.om_id = om_id.odf_pk
